verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* shewed \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w Tiberias|strong="G5085"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* shewed \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w manner|strong="G3779"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1510"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w together|strong="G3674"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Didymus|strong="G1324"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nathanael|strong="G3482"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Cana|strong="G2580"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* sons \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* saith \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w fishing|strong="G0232"\w*. \w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* thee. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w caught|strong="G4084"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* morning \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* shore: \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Children|strong="G3813"\w*, \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* meat? \w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w No|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* saith \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w net|strong="G1350"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w side|strong="G3313"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w*. \w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3765"\w* \w able|strong="G2480"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w draw|strong="G1670"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* fishes.

\w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*: \w It|strong="G0191"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0191"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, girt \w his|strong="G0025"\w* coat \w about|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3739"\w*, (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w*,) \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ship, (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w far|strong="G3112"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w two|strong="G1250"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w cubits|strong="G4083"\w*,) \w dragging|strong="G4951"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w net|strong="G1350"\w* \w with|strong="G0575"\w* fishes.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* soon \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* came \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w*, \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w saw|strong="G0991"\w* hot coals \w lying|strong="G2749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w fish|strong="G3795"\w* \w laid|strong="G2749"\w* thereon, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Bring|strong="G5342"\w* hither \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fishes \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w caught|strong="G4084"\w*.

\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drew|strong="G1670"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w net|strong="G1350"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w*, \w full|strong="G3324"\w* \w of|strong="G1093"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* fishes, \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fifty-three|strong="G4004"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w although|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w so|strong="G3767"\w* \w many|strong="G5118"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w net|strong="G1350"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* broken.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Come|strong="G1205"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* dine. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1161"\w* \w meat|strong="G3588"\w*, durst \w ask|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Who|strong="G3588"\w* art thou? \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* cometh \w and|strong="G2532"\w* taketh \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* giveth \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fish|strong="G3795"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w like|strong="G3668"\w* \w manner|strong="G3668"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w time|strong="G5154"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* \w to|strong="G3778"\w* \w his|strong="G5319"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w after|strong="G1537"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* dined, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*: \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* son \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, lovest thou \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w more|strong="G4183"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w*? \w He|strong="G0846"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Yea, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, thou knowest \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* thee. \w He|strong="G0846"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Feed|strong="G1006"\w* \w my|strong="G3754"\w* \w lambs|strong="G0721"\w*.

\w He|strong="G0846"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*: \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, son \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, lovest thou \w me|strong="G3004"\w*? \w He|strong="G0846"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Yea, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, thou knowest \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* thee. \w He|strong="G0846"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Feed \w my|strong="G4165"\w* lambs.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w time|strong="G5154"\w*: \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, son \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, lovest thou \w me|strong="G3004"\w*? \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w grieved|strong="G3076"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w time|strong="G5154"\w*: Lovest thou \w me|strong="G3004"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, thou knowest \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*: thou knowest \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w love|strong="G5368"\w* thee. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Feed|strong="G1006"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w*.

\w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*, \w amen|strong="G0281"\w* \w I|strong="G0281"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* thee, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* thou wast \w younger|strong="G3501"\w*, thou didst \w gird|strong="G2224"\w* thyself, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* didst \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* thou wouldst. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w old|strong="G1095"\w*, thou shalt \w stretch|strong="G1614"\w* forth thy \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w gird|strong="G2224"\w* thee, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lead|strong="G1510"\w* thee whither thou wouldst \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w signifying|strong="G4591"\w* \w by|strong="G3004"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G2316"\w* \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2316"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Follow|strong="G0190"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w turning|strong="G1994"\w* \w about|strong="G1909"\w*, \w saw|strong="G0991"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w following|strong="G0190"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w leaned|strong="G0377"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w breast|strong="G4738"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w supper|strong="G1173"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w betray|strong="G3860"\w* thee?

\w Him|strong="G3708"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w do|strong="G3708"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saith \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w So|strong="G4314"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w remain|strong="G3306"\w* till \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* thee? \w follow|strong="G0190"\w* thou \w me|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* abroad \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w should|strong="G0080"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w did|strong="G2064"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G0080"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w*, \w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w remain|strong="G3306"\w* till \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* thee?

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* giveth \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w which|strong="G2424"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w*; \w which|strong="G2424"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w itself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w I|strong="G1437"\w* think, \w would|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* able \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w contain|strong="G5562"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w books|strong="G0975"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*.
